result.eng: They should close every single window in the house.
result.ga: Ba chóir dóibh gach uile fhuinneog sa teach a dhúnadh
result.orig: Ba chóir dóibh gach uile fhuinneog sa teach a dhúnadh
result.html: Ba chóir dóibh gach uile fhuinneog sa teach a dhúnadhThey should close every single window in the house.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir dóiḃ gaċ uile ḟuinneog sa teaċ a ḋúnaḋThey should close every single window in the house.

result.eng: I haven't found a single mistake.
result.ga: Níor aimsigh mé oiread is botún amháin
result.orig: Níor aimsigh mé oiread is botún amháin
result.html: Níor aimsigh mé oiread is botún amháinI haven't found a single mistake.
result.ponchtml: Níor aimsiġ mé oiread is botún aṁáinI haven't found a single mistake.

result.eng: This single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ga: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.orig: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.html: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadhThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósaḋThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.

result.html: Tá mé singilI am single.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé singilI am single.

result.eng: Do you throw darts every single night on Tuesdays?
result.ga: An mbíonn tú ag caitheamh saighead gach aon oíche Dé Máirt
result.orig: An mbíonn tú ag caitheamh saighead gach aon oíche Dé Máirt
result.html: An mbíonn tú ag caitheamh saighead gach aon oíche Dé MáirtDo you throw darts every single night on Tuesdays?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn tú ag caiṫeaṁ saiġead gaċ aon oíċe Dé MáirtDo you throw darts every single night on Tuesdays?

result.html: Tá mé singilI'm single.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé singilI'm single.

result.eng: Don't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
result.ga: Ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá
result.orig: Ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá
result.html: Ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do láDon't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
result.ponchtml: Ná blais aon deor den ḃeoir ṁallaiṫe le do láDon't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
